title: JST, Hebrews 7
content: For this Melchizedek was ordained a priest after the order of the Son of God, which order was
without father, without mother, without descent, having neither beginning of days, nor end of life.
And all those who are ordained unto this priesthood are
made like unto the Son of God,
was administered without an oath and
the bringing in of a better hope; by the which we draw nigh unto God.
by so much was Jesus made the surety of a better testament.
(For those priests were made without an oath; but this with an oath by him that said unto him, The Lord sware and will not repent, Thou art a priest forever after the order of Melchizedek;)
For such an high priest became us, who is holy, harmless, undefiled, separate from sinners, and made
own sins, and then for the
he needeth not offer sacrifice for his own sins, for he knew no sins; but for the sins of the people. And
this he did once, when he offered up himself.
